actions.title: List Clients
actions.description: Retrieve clients. Supports filtering by active state and updated_since.

is_active.description: Filter by active (true) or archived (false) clients.

updated_since.description: Only return clients updated since this datetime (ISO 8601).

per_page.description: Number of records per page (max typically 100).

actions.title: Get Client
actions.description: Retrieve a specific client by ID.

actions.title: Create Client
actions.description: Create a new client.

is_active.description: Set client active or archived (default true).

currency.description: Default currency code for this client (e.g., USD).

actions.title: Update Client
actions.description: Update an existing client by ID.

actions.title: Archive (Delete) Client
actions.description: Archive a client (soft delete).

actions.title: List Projects
actions.description: Retrieve projects with filtering by client and active status.

updated_since.description: Only return projects updated since this datetime (ISO 8601).

actions.title: Get Project
actions.description: Retrieve a project by ID.

actions.title: Create Project
actions.description: Create a new project assigned to a client.

client_id.description: Client ID to associate the project with.

bill_by.description: Billing method, e.g., Project, People, Tasks, or None.

actions.title: Update Project
actions.description: Update an existing project.

actions.title: Archive (Delete) Project
actions.description: Archive a project (soft delete).

actions.title: List Project Task Assignments
actions.description: List tasks assigned to a project.

updated_since.description: Only assignments updated since this datetime (ISO 8601).

actions.title: Create Project Task Assignment
actions.description: Assign a task to a project.

hourly_rate.description: Override hourly rate for this task on this project.

budget.description: Budget for this task on this project.

actions.title: Update Project Task Assignment
actions.description: Update a task assignment on a project.

budget.description: Budget for this task on this project.

actions.title: Remove Project Task Assignment
actions.description: Remove a task from a project.

actions.title: List Project User Assignments
actions.description: List users assigned to a project.

updated_since.description: Only assignments updated since this datetime (ISO 8601).

actions.title: Create Project User Assignment
actions.description: Assign a user to a project.

is_project_manager.description: Whether the user is project manager.

hourly_rate.description: Override hourly rate for this user on this project.

budget.description: Budget for this user on this project.

actions.title: Update Project User Assignment
actions.description: Update a user assignment on a project.

budget.description: Budget for this user on this project.

actions.title: Remove Project User Assignment
actions.description: Remove a user from a project.

actions.title: List Tasks
actions.description: Retrieve tasks with filtering by active state and updated_since.

updated_since.description: Only return tasks updated since this datetime (ISO 8601).

actions.title: Get Task
actions.description: Retrieve a task by ID.

actions.title: Create Task
actions.description: Create a new task.

is_default.description: Whether this is a default task.

actions.title: Update Task
actions.description: Update an existing task.

actions.title: Archive (Delete) Task
actions.description: Archive a task (soft delete).

actions.title: List Time Entries
actions.description: List time entries with extensive filtering options.

updated_since.description: Only entries updated since this datetime (ISO 8601).

actions.title: Get Time Entry
actions.description: Retrieve a specific time entry by ID.

actions.title: Create Time Entry
actions.description: Create a new time entry.

user_id.description: User ID. If omitted, uses authenticated user.

external_reference.description: External reference payload to link to external systems.

actions.title: Update Time Entry
actions.description: Update fields on a time entry.

actions.title: Delete Time Entry
actions.description: Delete a time entry.

actions.title: Restart Time Entry
actions.description: Restart a stopped timer on a time entry.

actions.title: Stop Time Entry
actions.description: Stop a running timer.

actions.title: List Users
actions.description: Retrieve users. Admins can see all users; others may be restricted.

updated_since.description: Only return users updated since this datetime (ISO 8601).

actions.title: Get User
actions.description: Retrieve a user by ID.

actions.title: Get Current User
actions.description: Retrieve the authenticated user's details.

actions.title: Create User
actions.description: Create a new user (admin required).

actions.title: Update User
actions.description: Update a user (admin required).

actions.title: Archive (Delete) User
actions.description: Archive a user (admin required).

actions.title: List User Billable Rates
actions.description: List a users billable rates (historical).

actions.title: Create User Billable Rate
actions.description: Create a new billable rate for a user.

actions.title: List User Cost Rates
actions.description: List a users cost rates (historical).

actions.title: Create User Cost Rate
actions.description: Create a new cost rate for a user.

actions.title: List Invoices
actions.description: Retrieve invoices with filtering by client, project, and status.

updated_since.description: Only invoices updated since this datetime (ISO 8601).

state.description: Filter by state: draft, open, paid, closed.

actions.title: Get Invoice
actions.description: Retrieve a specific invoice by ID.

actions.title: Create Invoice
actions.description: Create a new invoice (draft).

line_items.description: Array of line items to include.

actions.title: Update Invoice
actions.description: Update invoice details or line items.

state.description: Change state where applicable (e.g., open/close via messages).

actions.title: Delete Draft Invoice
actions.description: Delete an invoice in draft state.

actions.title: List Invoice Messages
actions.description: List messages and events for an invoice (including send, close, reopen).

actions.title: Create Invoice Message / Mark Sent
actions.description: Create an invoice message (e.g., send, close, reopen). Use event_type=send to mark as sent and optionally email recipients.

recipients.description: Array of recipients for send events.

send_me_a_copy.description: Send a copy to the sender (send).

actions.title: Delete Invoice Message
actions.description: Delete an invoice message.

actions.title: List Invoice Payments
actions.description: List recorded payments for an invoice.

actions.title: Create Invoice Payment
actions.description: Record a payment for an invoice.

actions.title: Delete Invoice Payment
actions.description: Delete a recorded payment from an invoice.

actions.title: List Expenses
actions.description: Retrieve expenses with filtering by user, client, project, and date range.

updated_since.description: Only expenses updated since this datetime (ISO 8601).

actions.title: Get Expense
actions.description: Retrieve a specific expense by ID.

actions.title: Create Expense
actions.description: Create a new expense entry.

user_id.description: User ID. If omitted, uses authenticated user.

receipt.description: Optional receipt file info when using uploads.

actions.title: Update Expense
actions.description: Update an existing expense.

actions.title: Delete Expense
actions.description: Delete an expense entry.

actions.title: List Expense Categories
actions.description: Retrieve expense categories.

updated_since.description: Only categories updated since this datetime (ISO 8601).

actions.title: Get Expense Category
actions.description: Retrieve a specific expense category.

actions.title: Create Expense Category
actions.description: Create an expense category.

unit_name.description: Unit name if unit-based (e.g., mi, km).

actions.title: Update Expense Category
actions.description: Update an expense category.

actions.title: Delete Expense Category
actions.description: Delete an expense category.

actions.title: Get Uninvoiced Report
actions.description: Retrieve uninvoiced time and expenses over a date range.

actions.title: Get Project Budget Report
actions.description: Retrieve budget utilization for a project.

actions.title: Get Company
actions.description: Retrieve company settings and information.

actions.title: List Roles
actions.description: Retrieve all user roles.

actions.title: Get Role
actions.description: Retrieve a specific role by ID.

actions.title: Create Role
actions.description: Create a custom role.

user_ids.description: Array of user IDs to assign.

actions.title: Update Role
actions.description: Update role name and assigned users.

user_ids.description: Array of user IDs to assign.

actions.title: Delete Role
actions.description: Delete a custom role.

serviceJson.name: appmixer.harvest
serviceJson.label: Harvest
serviceJson.description: Harvest connector using API v2 for time tracking, projects, invoices, estimates, expenses, users, and reports. Base URL https://api.harvestapp.com/v2. Rate limit 100 requests per 15 seconds per account. All requests require Authorization: Bearer <token>, Harvest-Account-ID: <account_id>, and a User-Agent identifying your app.
